project_address: Block No-387, "Vandan Height"  Near Ashadeep International School, Punagam
promoterAddress: Block No-387, "Vandan Height" Near Ashadeep International School, Punagam Surat 395010

formThreeBId.notesToCertificate:
1. True and Fair to the Best of my Knowledge.
2. Loan Disbursal is Inclusive of Accrued Interest
3. Management has certified the creation Registered Agreement to Sale and also communicating the same to the Project Loan Bankers and have assured release of the same before the respective buyers on payment in full.
4. As per Provisional Unaudited Books of Accounts.
5. The RERA Bank Account withdrawals are made as per the latest notification / circular from the RERA Authorities and bank accounts have been maintained in accordance thereof. The promoter has bank accounts in addition to RERA Bank Accounts.
5. The Unsecured Loans reflect only the Balance outstanding. The Details of Acceptance and Repayment is filled taking into account all the historic data from the inception of books of account till date and includes payment of interest towards the loans accepted.
6. The Secured Loans included the details of Loan Accepted and Interest thereon.
This certificate is given on the basis of unaudited books of accounts since the operations have been affected due to present COVID 19 scenario.

BU Permission received on 21-06-2021. Certain Figures are taken upto 29-06-2021 in order to reflect true and fair scenario as on reporting date.

RERA Balance Shows a Collective Balance of RERA Escrow & RERA collection account
